column5: I need some help I am going to be fishing in Manitoba. In aug. about the first week. Would like to know if you can take steaks and any other kinda meat into manitoba. I had heard you cant take any in . THANK YOU
That's a new one on me. We HAVE BEEN GOING TO CANADA for 12 years now and that is one question they (the candians at the border) have never ask us.
Check out this link from Canada Border Services Agency:http://www.cbsa.gc.ca/E/pub/cp/rc416...tml#P192_11966 It looks like you "should" be okay :)
